content: It's possible that the lyrics could be interpreted in either of those ways, as they are somewhat ambiguous. It's possible that he could be referring to seeing his fans no matter where he goes, as they are always there to support him. On the other hand, he could also be referring to a particular person who stands out to him, no matter where he is in the world. Without additional context or information, it's difficult to say for certain what he intended the lyrics to mean.
